{{Marvel Database:Organization Template | Image = | Title = [[Tsahal]] | Name = Tsva Hagana LeIsrael
צְבָא הַהֲגָנָה לְיִשְׂרָאֵל | Aliases = [[Tsahal]], Tzahal, Israel Defense Forces, | Leaders = | CurrentMembers = | FormerMembers = [[Carter Dyam (Earth-616)|Carter Dyam]] | Identity = Public | Affiliation = | Allies = [[Mossad (Earth-616)|Mossad]] (Israeli Super Agents) | Enemies = [[Palestine Liberation Organization (Earth-616)|P.L.O.]], [[Israelis for Anarchy (Earth-616)|Israelis for Anarchy]], formerly [[Saddam Hussein (Earth-616)|Saddam Hussein]]'s [[Iraq]], [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] | Origin = Liberation and defense of Israel | Reality = Earth-616 | Status = Active | BaseOfOperations = [[Israel]] | PlaceOfFormation = [[Israel]] | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = | First = | History = Tsahal is the common name designating the Israel Defense Forces. On [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]]'s first visit in Israel, he targeted a scout, prompting his being surrounded by massive IDF contingent. Seeing that the Israelis would not retreat, even in the face of Hulk's fury, he decided himself to quit the fight by jumping away, only to fall on an airport; where he tried to use a plane to get back home; and was targeted by Israel's Air Force. The American military asked Israel to grant him safe passage, as they had their own plans for him.{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 1 387}} After a war against [[Saddam Hussein (Earth-616)|Saddam Hussein]]'s [[Iraq]], during which the [[United States of America|U.S.A.]] had come to aid [[Israel]], many Tsahal soldiers fell powerless and frustrated, ending up with numerous domestic violence reports.{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 1 387}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = Conventional weapons (guns, rifles, tanks, fighter planes) | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Historical Organizations]] [[Category:Government Organizations]]
